title: Language Project Learning Design Based on Immersive Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and elementary language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Process for current elementary school teachers to design and implement language education projects using augmented reality (AR) and 3D virtual worlds (3DVW).

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more context-specific language learning scenarios in a classroom environment using augmented reality (AR) tools.
Learners can develop and implement two culture-based language projects using a 3D virtual world (3DVW) platform.
Learners can facilitate collaborative language learning activities in large-class settings by integrating digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
